Description: ISO (the International Organization for Standardization) and IEC (the International Electrotechnical Commission) form the specialized system for worldwide standardization.

Requirements.Description: Ensure that the organization establishes and maintains business continuity policies to manage disruptive incidents effectively.
Requirements.Name: Business Continuity Policies

Attributes.Check_Summary: Implement policies and procedures to ensure the organization can continue its critical operations during and after a disruptive incident.

Requirements.Description: Ensure that the organization conducts a business impact analysis and risk assessment to identify critical business functions, assess the impact of disruptions, and develop appropriate risk mitigation strategies.
Requirements.Name: Business Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment

Attributes.Category: c.8.2 Business Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
Attributes.Objetive_Name: Business Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
Attributes.Check_Summary: Implement checks and procedures to identify and assess the impact of potential disruptions on critical business functions, and ensure that appropriate backup plans are in place.

Requirements.Description: Ensure that the organization develops and implements strategies to ensure the continuity of critical business functions during and after a disruption.
Requirements.Name: Business Continuity Strategy

Attributes.Check_Summary: Implement checks and strategies to ensure the continuity of critical business functions, including enabling CloudTrail for logging and ensuring RDS instances have backups enabled.
